alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 10:30PM AKST until March 01 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HEAVY SNOW TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH WEDNESDAY... A storm force low is moving towards the northern gulf coast and will stall out during the day on Wednesday. Snow has began to spread over the northern panhandle tonight and will continue to move south through Wednesday. Temperatures are remaining below freezing with dewpoints in the 20s. All communities throughout SEAK are still expected to see snow but some uncertainty remains regarding snow totals for the southern half of the panhandle as southerly flow will cause a mix of rain/snow or even a complete change to rain through Wednesday evening. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Sitka. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to mix or change to rain midday Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: City and Borough of Sitka; Prince of Wales Island
